name: Knights of the Colony (DEMO)
description:
The new Demo for Knights of the Colony is here! Originally submitted as a Prototype for Game Off 2021, in Knights of the Colony, you'll be controlling the Ant Knights, who's job it is to protect their colony from their enemies, the Wasps. There are different types of Ants in the Colony that have different jobs, the Knights protect the Colony, The Ant Villagers look around and Collect food, The Worker Ants in construction hats build everything like their tunnels and the Queen is the Leader and give orders.

Credits:

Art, Design & Programming: Jeffrey McFarland

Music: Created by Ecrett Music

Sound: All Sounds downloaded from freesound.org
